AddlDataMeasure.description: Provides additional supporting measurement information in case the Special Service requires it.

Qty.description: A quantity is a counted number of non-monetary units, possibly including fractions.

SpecialServiceCode.description: Code that identifies the special service.

IATALocationCode.description: IATA defined code identifying a city or station.

StationName.description: Name of the station. E.g. George Bush Intercontinental Airport

AllRefundableInd.description: When true, all tax breakdown amounts are refundable.

Breakdown.description: Amount added on to a charge for a specific product, purpose, or service.

AllRefundableInd.description: When true, all tax breakdown amounts are refundable.

ApproximateInd.description: When true, this tax amount is approximate.

CollectionInd.description: When true, this tax must be collected.

Tax.description: A compulsory contribution to state revenue, levied by the government on workers' income and business profits or added to the cost of some goods, services, and transactions.

TotalTaxAmount.description: Total of all applicable tax amounts included in the price.  If tax breakdowns are provided, this amount should match the sum of the tax breakdown amounts.

AddlFiledTaxCode.description: A qualifier to the Tax Code to distinguish taxes/fees/charges with the same tax code but with different business uses.

AddlTaxCode.description: A qualifier to the Tax Code to distinguish taxes/fees/charges with the same tax code but with different business uses.

AppTypeCode.description: Indicates at which point the tax was applied (e.g. S - Sale, D - Departure, A - Arrival, X - Delivery).

ApproximateInd.description: When true, this tax amount is approximate.

CollectionInd.description: When true, this tax must be collected.

CollectionPointTax.description: Tax data breakdown by collection point for XF(Passenger Facility Fee) and ZP(federal tax segment) taxes.

Country.description: A nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

CountrySubDivision.description: An area of land which is a sub-division within a country, such as a state, a county, a canton, a province, etc.

CurConversion.description: The result of converting one currency into another currency. E.g. local currency to USD, air miles to monetary.

DescText.description: Baggage Allowance description and additional information.

FiledAmount.description: Internal tax filed amount as determined by the airline.

QualifierCode.description: Used to specify if current, paid, additional taxes   Refer to IATA PADIS Code list data element 5305.

RefundInd.description: When true, this tax is refundable.

TaxCode.description: IATA TTBS Tax Code. Example: AY, GB

TaxTypeCode.description: Tax type code (e.g. Applied or Exempt).

Desc.description: An account or representation of the certain or major aspects, characteristics, or features of a person, object, or event.

TermID.description: Unique identifier associated to a term instance.

Term.description: Condition under which an agreement is reached.

Desc.description: An account or representation of the certain or major aspects, characteristics, or features of a person, object, or event.

OwnerCode.description: Airline code assigned to a carrier. Either ICAO-defined 3-character code or IATA-defined 2-character code.

StationName.description: Name of the station. E.g. George Bush Intercontinental Airport

AllRefundableInd.description: When true, all tax breakdown amounts are refundable.

Breakdown.description: Amount added on to a charge for a specific product, purpose, or service.

AllRefundableInd.description: When true, all tax breakdown amounts are refundable.

ApproximateInd.description: When true, this tax amount is approximate.

CollectionInd.description: When true, this tax must be collected.

Tax.description: A compulsory contribution to state revenue, levied by the government on workers' income and business profits or added to the cost of some goods, services, and transactions.

AddlTaxCode.description: A qualifier to the Tax Code to distinguish taxes/fees/charges with the same tax code but with different business uses.

AppTypeCode.description: Indicates at which point the tax was applied (e.g. S - Sale, D - Departure, A - Arrival, X - Delivery).

ApproximateInd.description: When true, this tax amount is approximate.

CollectionInd.description: When true, this tax must be collected.

Country.description: A nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

CountrySubDivision.description: An area of land which is a sub-division within a country, such as a state, a county, a canton, a province, etc.

CurConversion.description: The result of converting one currency into another currency. E.g. local currency to USD, air miles to monetary.

DescText.description: Baggage Allowance description and additional information.

FiledAmount.description: Internal tax filed amount as determined by the airline.

FiledTaxCode.description: Internal tax filed type code as determined by the airline.

QualifierCode.description: Used to specify if current, paid, additional taxes   Refer to IATA PADIS Code list data element 5305.

RefundInd.description: When true, this tax is refundable.

TaxCode.description: IATA TTBS Tax Code. Example: AY, GB

TaxTypeCode.description: Tax type code (e.g. Applied or Exempt).

Desc.description: An account or representation of the certain or major aspects, characteristics, or features of a person, object, or event.

TermID.description: Unique identifier associated to a term instance.

Term.description: Condition under which an agreement is reached.

AircraftScheduledDateTime.description: The Scheduled Date and Time of Departure of the aircraft at the terminal or departure gate at an airport.

BoardingGateID.description: Identifier of the gate. E.g. A5

IATALocationCode.description: IATA defined code identifying a city or station.

StationName.description: Name of the station. E.g. George Bush Intercontinental Airport

AircraftScheduledDateTime.description: The Scheduled Date and Time of Departure of the aircraft at the terminal or departure gate at an airport.

BoardingGateID.description: Identifier of the gate. E.g. A5

IATALocationCode.description: IATA defined code identifying a city or station.

StationName.description: Name of the station. E.g. George Bush Intercontinental Airport

EnterBeforeDate.description: Date at which the visa expires and is no longer a valid entry document.

EntryQty.description: Number of entries permitted by the visa into the host country.

HostCountryCode.description: ISO Country Code where the visa is valid.

StayDuration.description: Duration permitted of the Passenger's stay in the visa host country (in days).

Code.description: The code corresponding to the processing warning as defined by PADIS 9321.

DescText.description: Baggage Allowance description and additional information.

LangCode.description: Language code associated with the warning response.

OwnerName.description: The name of the organization owning the warning codelist.

StatusText.description: Document processing status.  Recommended values are NotProcessed, Incomplete, Complete, Unknown.

TagText.description: Identifies the tag/XPath which relates to the provided warning.

TypeCode.description: Uses a bilaterally agreed set of values to indicate the warning type.  The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has not been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type = 'unknown'.

URL.description: Link to an online description of the provided warning.

WarningID.description: Unique identifier for this warning instance.

ApplicableBagText.description: Applicable bag type.  Examples: Carry-On, 1st Checked Bag, 2nd Checked Bag

ApplicablePartyText.description: Baggage weight restriction application.  Examples: Party, Traveler. Party applies to all Travelers.

DescText.description: Baggage Allowance description and additional information.

MaximumWeightMeasure.description: Maximum weight value and unit of measure.  Example: 50
